title: Fix favicon still not showing in browser tab

requirements.text: Ensure the favicon file exists in the deployed frontend static assets at exactly: frontend/public/assets/generated/subrin-favicon-uploaded.dim_32x32.png, and that it is a valid, non-empty PNG image.
acceptanceCriteria: The repository contains the file at frontend/public/assets/generated/subrin-favicon-uploaded.dim_32x32.png.
Requesting /assets/generated/subrin-favicon-uploaded.dim_32x32.png in a browser returns HTTP 200 with Content-Type image/png.
The browser tab shows the custom favicon instead of the default icon after a hard refresh.

requirements.text: Keep frontend/index.html favicon markup correct and compatible across browsers by ensuring a 32x32 PNG favicon link is present and points to /assets/generated/subrin-favicon-uploaded.dim_32x32.png, and add a second redundant favicon link (same href) using rel="shortcut icon" to improve compatibility.
acceptanceCriteria: frontend/index.html contains a <link rel="icon" type="image/png" sizes="32x32" href="/assets/generated/subrin-favicon-uploaded.dim_32x32.png" /> entry.
frontend/index.html also contains a <link rel="shortcut icon" type="image/png" href="/assets/generated/subrin-favicon-uploaded.dim_32x32.png" /> entry.
After redeploy, the favicon appears in the browser tab when loading the site in a fresh/incognito window.

constraints: All user-facing text must remain in English.
Do not edit any files under frontend/src/components/ui or any other immutable paths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
nonGoals: No changes to site content/sections unrelated to the favicon issue.
